synopsis: The young man who lives in Xiaoyanggang dreams of martyrdom, but his eyes are blind, but he can only sneak into the market by swindling. Until one day, Rakshasa attacked Xiaoyanggang, and his mother, who was dependent on him, suddenly disappeared. Lang Ming had to embark on the road of finding the truth. After a wave of unrest, the ancient gods and beasts are in danger, and the legendary chivalrouss are also in front of them. Lang Ming has also embarked on an adventure that has changed his lifeâ€¦
